text: Ramajana mahina to ahe, jyata kura'ana utaravila gela, jo lokankarita margadarsana ahe ani jo margadarsaka ani satya va asatyacya daramyana nirnayaka ahe. Tevha tumacyapaiki jo koni ya mahin'yasa prapta karila, tyane roje rakhale pahijeta, parantu jo ajari asela, kinva pravasata asela tara tyane itara divasata hi sankhya purna karuna ghetali pahije. Allaha tumacyakarita sahaja-sulabhata icchito, sakti- adacana icchita nahi. To icchito ki tumhi ganana purna karuna ghyavi ani allahane pradana kelelya margadarsananusara tyaci mahanata varnana kara ani tyace krtajnasila (dasa) banuna raha
